sense.gloss: to come out, to fall out, to be omitted, to be missing, to escape, to come loose
to be clear, to be transparent (e.g. of the sky)
to be stupid, to be absentminded, to be careless, to be inattentive
to go through, to pass through, to give way, to collapse
to finish a round with more than 88 points (not counting points gained from scoring combinations)
ridding oneself, freeing oneself of, growing out of, overcoming, outgrowing
withdrawal (e.g. from an organization), secession, leaving, pulling out

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑服↑↓ふく↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでいる。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑直↑↓ただ↓ちにクラブを↑脱退↑↓だったい↓したほうがよい。
sdata.e: You may as well withdraw from the club right away.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぐには↑及↑↓およ↓ばない。
sdata.e: You need not take off your shoes.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑脱帽↑↓だつぼう↓するよ。
sdata.e: I take my hat off to you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にはシャッポを↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぐよ。
sdata.e: I take my hat off to you!

sdata.j: ↑靴下↑↓くつした↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでください。
↑靴下↑↓くつした↓はお↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎください。
↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いで↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
どうぞ↑靴↑↓くつ↓をお↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎ↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。

words.gloss: to come out, to fall out, to be omitted, to be missing, to escape, to come loose
